item.title: Tory add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "If you thought that science was certain - well, that is just an error on your part." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Tory add a quote by Aaron Allston
item.description: "Oh, wonderful. I killed his father. He hates me. He knows how to make bombs. Come on, Wedge, how does this story end?" -- Aaron Allston

item.title: Tory add a quote by Aaron Alston
item.description: "I don't <i>have</i> to blow up everything I see... I just like to." -- Aaron Alston

item.title: Tory add a quote by Aaron Allston
Tory add a quote by Aaron Allston
Tory add a quote by Aaron Allston
item.description: "I marked their location in case Kell wanted to blow them up or something.” “I don’t have to blow up everything I see. I just like to." -- Aaron Allston
